translation.en: Our target is wearing a captain's uniform. I repeat, a person in a captain's uniform.
translation.es: El objetivo lleva uniforme de capitán. Repito, persona vestida de capitán.

translation.en: - Thank you. - Bravo!
Come with me, Captain.
Let's go find our table. The show's about to start.
translation.es: Vayamos a la mesa. El show está por empezar.

translation.en: Goddamn! That is bright. I can't see anything in there.
Yeah. It's like looking straight into the sun.
translation.es: Sí, es como si miráramos directo al sol.

translation.en: What the hell is he up to in there? I bet something nuclear.
translation.es: ¿Qué diablos hacen ahí? Debe ser algo nuclear.

translation.en: Remove your night- vision goggles. I repeat, remove the night- vision goggles.
translation.es: Quítense las gafas de visión nocturna. Repito, quítense las gafas.

translation.en: This better work, Mr. Know- It- All Vision Expert.
translation.es: Más vale que funcione, Señor Experto Sabelotodo.

translation.en: Okay, fine.
- Set your tasers for max electrocution. - Let's take this asshole down hard.
translation.es: Pistolas con máxima descarga eléctrica. Acabemos con este imbécil.

translation.en: Hold on a sec. Wait, wait! There are multiple captains in there.
translation.es: Un momento. Hay muchos capitanes ahí.

translation.en: Decoys.
Ugh, so devious. Go, go, go!
Pacify the captains! Our target could be any one of them.
translation.es: ¡Inmovilicen a los capitanes! Uno de ellos es el objetivo.

translation.en: No! No! Oh! Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.
Son of a bitch!
But they're just kids!
This is no time to categorize or pigeonhole people, Agent Steel.
translation.es: No hay tiempo para categorizar o encasillar a las personas, agente Steel.

translation.en: Tase them all.
That's what you get for being a decoy.
translation.es: Eso te pasa por ser un señuelo.

translation.en: - Do not move! Do not move! -
Well, well, well.
What have we got here?
I am Captain Tucker, and I am in charge of this vessel.
translation.es: Soy el capitán Tucker y estoy al mando de este buque.

translation.en: What on earth are you doing here? - I demand answers! - Oh…
- - You'll get your answers all right.
You'll get your answers in a jail cell.
translation.es: Se las darán en su celda, en la cárcel.

translation.en: Well, uh, actually, we should probably read him his rights
translation.es: De hecho, deberíamos leerle sus derechos

translation.en: and inform him of the charges against him.
translation.es: e informarle de qué se lo acusa.

translation.en: And all that.
Oh, nice, Steel. That was a cool- ass line. Way to ruin the moment.
translation.es: Gracias, Steel. Era un gran remate. Qué manera de arruinar el momento.

translation.en: You wanna do that cool line again, Chief?
Nope, nope, nope. The moment is gone.
Steel took that away from us.
Everyone, just… Let's just leave. Let's go.
Hello, sir. They got him.
It's on again.
This is scandalous! Agh!
It was just after midnight
police raided the Pacific Pearl and arrested Captain Herman Tucker
translation.es: la policía allanó el Perla del Pacífico y detuvo al capitán Herman Tucker,

translation.en: on multiple charges of drug smuggling,
translation.es: a quien se acusa de narcotráfico,

translation.en: trafficking, possession of illegal firearms,
translation.es: contrabando, posesión ilegítima de armas de fuego,

translation.en: and slaughter of endangered animals.
translation.es: y caza de animales en peligro de extinción.

translation.en: - Watch out. Pee incoming. - Ugh!
That's a good one.
Yeah, looks like I peed my pants pretty massively.
translation.es: Sí, parece que me oriné encima con litros de pis.

translation.en: Whatever, Fall.
Yep, just emptied my bladder in my pants.
translation.es: Sí, vacié la vejiga en mis pantalones.

translation.en: That's me. No, that's… It's good stuff. See you at the next, uh… Yeah.
translation.es: Así soy yo. Buen chiste. Nos vemos la próxima… Sí.

translation.en: The prosecution is getting ready for the trial of the century.
translation.es: La fiscalía se prepara para el juicio del siglo.

translation.en: But first, Captain Tucker is going to be isolated in prison,
translation.es: Pero, primero, el capitán Tucker quedará incomunicado en su celda,

translation.en: where should he for some reason pass away,
translation.es: y si, por algún motivo, falleciera,

translation.en: the district attorney would lose her only witness.
translation.es: el fiscal de distrito perdería a su único testigo.

translation.en: Oh, it looks like I peed myself, but, um…
I'm just the butt of a great prank. Don't worry.
translation.es: pero fui víctima de una broma pesada.

translation.en: - Oh… kay. - Yeah, it's not urine.
- Mm. - Oh, it's actually…
It's actually Fanta.
Whatever, Fall. Exam results are in. You should check 'em out.
translation.es: Como digas. Llegaron los resultados de los exámenes. Ve a verlos.

translation.en: They're here? Should I be excited or--
Oh yeah. This is it.
translation.es: Es la hora de la verdad.

translation.en: This is the exam that decides your career, and you really stand out.
translation.es: Este examen define tu carrera, y tú te destacaste.

translation.en: Really? Oh!
Okay. Here we go.
Fall, Fall. Duh- duh- duh…
Duh… No…
Ah, darn it.
Right…
Guys. Wow, I am just so proud right now.
We have helped rid the world of evil.
translation.es: Ayudamos a eliminar el mal del mundo.

translation.en: - Let's have some cake. - Fuck, yeah! Cake tastes good.
translation.es: - Comamos pastel. - ¡Sí, carajo! Pastel, qué delicia.

translation.en: Yeah, I just have this weird hunch. Am I the only one who thinks
translation.es: Tengo un mal presentimiento. Tal vez haya más en el caso del capitán Tucker.

translation.en: there could be more to this Captain Tucker case?
translation.es: Tal vez haya más en el caso del capitán Tucker.

translation.en: Say what, Steel?
I just mean that… does everyone really believe
that one man single- handedly did all those horrible things by himself
translation.es: que un hombre cometió todas esas atrocidades él solo

translation.en: without anyone else on that ship knowing?
translation.es: sin que nadie en el buque lo supiera?

translation.en: Wow.
Right?
Just wow.
Could be a criminal organization running that ship.
translation.es: Tal vez una banda delictiva maneja ese buque.

translation.en: Captain Tucker could actually just be the tip of the iceberg.
translation.es: El capitán Tucker podría ser la punta del iceberg.

translation.en: Some kind of pawn. A patsy, a fall guy.
- You know what I think, Steel? - No.
I think it's actually time for you to shut your big yapper.
translation.es: Es hora de que cierres esa bocota.

translation.en: - Right on! - Can't you just enjoy this glorious win?
translation.es: Así se habla. ¿No puedes disfrutar de la victoria?

translation.en: Washington has been this close to shutting us down,
and now you come here with this… this nonsense.
translation.es: y ahora sales con esta estupidez.

translation.en: Yeah, what an asshole!
Fuck you, Steel! Fuck you to hell!
translation.es: Vete a la mierda, Steel. Y no vuelvas.

translation.en: To be completely honest with you, Steel, no one likes a snoopy agent.
translation.es: Para ser sincero contigo, Steel, a nadie le gusta un agente entrometido.

translation.en: Really?
All that sneaking around, gathering evidence,
retrieving lost documents, and finding witnesses
translation.es: recuperar documentos perdidos y encontrar testigos

translation.en: that could shed new light on a case?
translation.es: que arrojen luz a un caso?

translation.en: Ugh. People hate that.
- But that's kind of our job though. - Our job was to crack this case.
translation.es: - Pero es nuestro trabajo. - Nuestro trabajo era resolver este caso.

translation.en: - And now it's cracked. -
Yes?
Mm. Unfortunate?
Roger that.
Listen up, team.
Captain Tucker just killed himself in jail.
translation.es: El capitán Tucker se suicidó en la cárcel.

translation.en: Suicide, Epstein- style.
What?
It's probably because he was torn apart by guilt.
translation.es: Seguramente porque lo carcomía la culpa.

translation.en: So the train has left the station. Case closed forever.
translation.es: Perdiste tu oportunidad. Caso cerrado para siempre.

translation.en: In your face, Steel.
Oh! Yes. Oh. Let's go!
♪ Let's do it, let's do it, let's do it ♪
Yeah!
Hey, what are you doing with, uh, that evidence?
You heard the chief. Case is closed. We're burning everything.
translation.es: Ya oíste al jefe. Se cerró el caso. Quemaremos todo.

translation.en: Yeah, just dumping it into the evidence destroyer downstairs.
translation.es: La llevaremos a la destructora de pruebas de abajo.

translation.en: Let me take that down for you.
I'm actually heading down to the evidence destroyer right now.
translation.es: Justo iba a la destructora de pruebas.

translation.en: Great. Thanks. Uh, just don't take it home. - That's a federal offense, you know. - Ha- ha!
translation.es: Genial. Gracias. No te la lleves a casa. Es un delito federal.

translation.en: I know. I would never do that because that is not what I am going to do.
translation.es: Ya sé. Jamás haría eso, no es lo que voy a hacer.

translation.en: - Far from it. - Great. Good to hear.
translation.es: - Lejos estoy de eso. - Me alegro.

translation.en: This will not be that one case I couldn't let go of
translation.es: Este no será uno de esos casos que no pueda olvidar

translation.en: and eventually get totally Carrie Mathison- obsessed with.
translation.es: y con el cual me obsesione.

translation.en: Perfect.
No way, no, sir. Ain't happening. Not this guy.
translation.es: Imposible. No, señor. Eso no sucederá.

translation.en: Too grounded for that stuff.
Hi.
Well, you're listening to 102.6 The Hawk,
and up next, we have a great tune from one of my favorites.
translation.es: y a continuación, una gran canción, de mis preferidas.

translation.en: How can I help you, young man?
Oh, hi. Jonathan Fall. I… I called. Um…
Oh yes. Mr. Fall. Please come in.
translation.es: Sí. El señor Fall. Pase, por favor.

translation.en: Oh, I was just looking at my family on the wall out there.
translation.es: Vi fotos de mi familia en la pared.

translation.en: Fall family has been roaming the seas for generations,
translation.es: La familia Fall ha surcado los mares por generaciones,

translation.en: so… they expect nothing less from me.
translation.es: La familia Fall ha surcado los mares por generaciones, así que no esperan menos de mí.

translation.en: Let's see here. Jonathan Fall.
Okay, well, I know when you look at my grades, it… it doesn't look that great,
translation.es: Sé que mis calificaciones no se ven nada bien,

translation.en: but the ocean is in my blood. It's in my genes, I think, so…
translation.es: pero llevo el mar en la sangre. Está en mis genes, creo…

translation.en: Okay.
Yeah, my… my… my family was practically responsible for the Allies winning World War II,
translation.es: Mi familia prácticamente hizo que los Aliados ganaran la Segunda Guerra,

translation.en: so not too… shabby.
The thing is, you had the worst exams in the history of the Naval Academy.
translation.es: Usted tiene las peores calificaciones en la historia de la Academia Naval.

translation.en: Right now, the closest you'll ever get to commanding a ship
translation.es: Lo más cerca que puede estar de comandar un buque

translation.en: is turning tricks at the docks.
Oh, I don't know, I mean…
If there were guarantees that I would eventually command a ship…
translation.es: Si hay garantía de que al final comandaré un buque…

translation.en: Just as a starting gig, maybe I--
translation.es: Como primer trabajo, tal vez pueda…

translation.en: I am obviously joking, Fall.
Yeah. Of course.  Me, a hooker? No, I… I would never. That's, um…
translation.es: Sí. Por supuesto. ¿Prostituirme? No, jamás lo haría.

translation.en: I was just joking too. Just, uh…
two people in an office just crackin' jokes.
translation.es: Somos dos personas en una oficina haciendo chistes.

translation.en: Anyway, you were saying?
What I can offer you is an extensive personality test,
translation.es: Podemos ofrecerle un test de personalidad extensivo,

translation.en: where you can show potential employers what you're really made of.
translation.es: para mostrar sus aptitudes a posibles empleadores.

translation.en: Maybe you have some hidden talents
translation.es: Tal vez tenga algún talento oculto,

translation.en: hidden deep, deep down there. Somewhere.
translation.es: muy en el fondo. En algún lado.

translation.en: There. Done.  I'm pretty sure I nailed it.
translation.es: Listo. Seguro aprobé con muy buena nota.

translation.en: Mm, there is nothing to nail. It's a personality test.
translation.es: No hay aprobado o desaprobado. Es un test de personalidad.

translation.en: Hold on. I'll get the results in two secs.
Ooh, wow, there are some great ships here.
Could you send my test results to the Emperor of the Seas maybe?
translation.es: ¿Podría enviar mis resultados al Emperador del Mar?

translation.en: Is that crazy?
- - Oh. Oh Lord.
- That good? - No.
But I owe it to your family name to get you something.
translation.es: Pero, por respeto a su familia, debo conseguirle algo.

translation.en: Oh! Ah, this could be an opportunity for you to work on that personality
translation.es: Quizás esta sea su oportunidad de moldear su personalidad

translation.en: and get some job experience.
And who knows what could happen down the line, Fall.
translation.es: ¿Quién sabe qué le depara el futuro, Fall?

translation.en: Wow, that is awesome.
Thank you. Tha… Thank you so much, ma'am.
That is just a dream come true. Thank you for believing in me.
translation.es: Mi sueño se hizo realidad. Gracias por creer en mí.

translation.en: - - Thar she blows!
That's on you, Mrs. Gilroy.
- That beautiful saggy ass distracted me. -
translation.es: Ese hermoso trasero fofo me distrajo.

translation.en: Oh, never mind. Those things happen.
- Hey, Tanner! -
Can't hear me.
Jonathan, darling.
Hey, Mom.
I didn't know we were having a party. What's the occasion?
translation.es: No sabía que había una fiesta. - ¿Qué festejan? - El cumpleaños de tu hermano.

translation.en: - Oh, it's your brother's big day. - Big day?
translation.es: - ¿Qué festejan? - El cumpleaños de tu hermano. ¿En serio?

translation.en: Yes, we're celebrating Tanner's 33 and a half birthday.
translation.es: Sí, celebramos que Tanner cumple 33 años y medio.

translation.en: Oh. Cool. I'll… I'll… I'll just get changed, and then I'll join in.
translation.es: Genial. Iré a cambiarme y los acompaño.

translation.en: Yeah, about that. You know what? How about you just climb up in your treehouse,
translation.es: Con respecto a eso, ¿sabes qué? Mejor sube a tu casa del árbol

translation.en: and we'll bring you some food up there.
Your father and I thought that would be a great idea.
translation.es: A tu padre y a mí nos pareció una buena idea.

translation.en: I totally agree. It's… It's just that I would really like to, uh, join the party.
translation.es: Estoy de acuerdo. Pero me gustaría mucho venir a la fiesta.

translation.en: Of course, but I think it might be better for you to just skip it.
translation.es: Por supuesto, pero creo que sería mejor que no vinieras.

translation.en: - So let's go ahead and do that. - Roger that.
Oh, Angela, you made it!
Hi, Dad.
Here you go. Chow down.
Ooh, thank you. So hungry. Good party?
translation.es: Gracias. Tengo mucha hambre. ¿Qué tal la fiesta?

translation.en: Oh yeah. So great. So much fun.
translation.es: Marcha muy bien. Nos divertimos mucho.

translation.en: Skrillex is DJing later,
and your brother is sparkling like a star down there.
translation.es: y tu hermano brilla como una estrella.

translation.en: Oh. I bet.
May… Maybe I can come down and join in for a little while?
Just say hello to Uncle Herman and them maybe, just to get a little taste of the fun.
translation.es: Para saludar al tío Herman y divertirme un poco.

translation.en: Well, in an ideal world, it's exactly what you would have done,
translation.es: En un mundo ideal, seguro lo habrías hecho.

translation.en: but we don't want to risk you ruining your brother's big day with your presence.
translation.es: Pero no queremos que le arruines el día a tu hermano con tu presencia.

translation.en: What? Well, I wouldn't ruin anything.
I'll stay low, have a little friendly chat here and there. Yes?
translation.es: No llamaré la atención. Solo conversaré un poco. ¿Sí?

translation.en: Nope, not gonna happen.
Oh… Okay.
Oh. Oh. You're taking the ladder?
Oh, it's just a security measure.
Mostly to protect you from people climbing up and disturbing you.
translation.es: Para protegerte de quienes suban a molestarte.

translation.en: Don't want an old uncle to come up there
translation.es: No quiero que un tío viejo suba

translation.en: and have his way with you or anything like that.
What?
I'm not saying it will happen,
but statistically, every family has a molester in their ranks.
translation.es: pero, por estadística, en toda familia hay un abusador.

translation.en: Yikes, okay. Um, well, thank you, I guess.
I'll put it back in the morning, I almost promise.
translation.es: La colocaré en la mañana. Casi seguro.

translation.en: Oh, that would be great. Okay. Good night, Dad.
translation.es: Eso sería genial. Buenas noches, papá.

translation.en: Good night… you.
♪ Know what I mean And do the little… on the catwalk ♪
translation.es: Tú me entiendes. Y lo hago… en la pasarela.

translation.en: ♪ I'm on the catwalk, yeah I'm on a catwalk! ♪
translation.es: En la pasarela, sí. ¡Desfilo en la pasarela!

translation.en: Tanner. So talented.
♪ Too sexy for my pants Too sexy for my… ♪
translation.es: Soy muy sexi en pantalones. Muy sexi en…

translation.en: You're the best, Tanner!
That's unfortunate.
Of course, Mr. Tyrant.
- Was that him? - Yeah.
He wants us to take a different approach this time.
Instead of finding a captain with certain credentials,
translation.es: En vez de buscar un capitán experimentado,

translation.en: he wants us to find a captain with… none.
Like a wet piece of clay with a license to command a ship.
translation.es: ¿Como un trozo de arcilla con permiso para comandar un buque?

translation.en: Yeah, I guess.
Let's get to it.
Yah. Coming through. I know the, uh, captain.
translation.es: A un lado. Conozco al capitán.

translation.en: He's the kids' uncle, so move it.
translation.es: Es el tío de los niños. Córranse. Saluden a su tío, niños.

translation.en: - Hey, say hello to your uncle, kids. - Uncle?
translation.es: Es el tío de los niños. Córranse. Saluden a su tío, niños. ¿Tío?

translation.en: Just messing with you.
I'm trying to bang their mother, and she made me take them to the park.
translation.es: Quiero acostarme con su madre. Me hizo traerlos al parque.

translation.en: - Can you believe that? - What?
What, what? If you don't wanna know the truth,
translation.es: ¿Qué qué? Si te duele la verdad,

translation.en: stop listening in on other people's conversations.
I think he… Honestly, I think this one's slow.
translation.es: Creo que este es medio lelo.

translation.en: Here. Why don't you go on the ride? Thank you.
translation.es: Suban a dar una vuelta. Gracias.

translation.en: Insane birthday party, huh?
I had, like, six beers. I'm hungover like a mofo.
translation.es: Tomé seis cervezas. Tengo una resaca del carajo.

translation.en: Okay.
Yeah, it got totally outta hand.
Fucked three chicks, or hens, or whatever.
translation.es: Me cogí a tres chicas o lo que fueran, no sé.

translation.en: I thought there were mostly senior citizens there last night.
translation.es: Ayer, en su mayoría, había personas mayores.

translation.en: What can I say?
I like the taste of raisins just as good as grapes.
translation.es: Me gustan tanto las pasas de uva como las uvas frescas.

translation.en: Okay.
Anyway, I can't believe I'm finally 33 and a half.
translation.es: No puedo creer que ya tengo 33 y medio.

translation.en: Wow, time flies when you're doing great and having tons of fun at the same time,
translation.es: El tiempo vuelva cuando te va genial y te diviertes al mismo tiempo,

translation.en: both at work and in private.
translation.es: tanto en el trabajo como en la vida.

translation.en: Sure… Sure. Yes, I get it.
Hey, what's wrong with this ride? Can't it go any faster?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa con este barco? ¿No puede ir más rápido?

translation.en: Well, this is as fast as I am allowed to take this… old lady.
translation.es: No me permiten navegar más rápido.

translation.en: Come on, Tiny J.
You know I'm a real captain, right? I could order you if I wanted to.
translation.es: Sabes que soy capitán, ¿no? Debes obedecer mis órdenes.

translation.en: Ah, I…  I don't think you could do that.
Oh. Oh, you wanna test me? Do you?
- No. - Do you seriously wanna test me?
- I really don't-- - I hereby commandeer this ship.
translation.es: - Yo no… - Voy a comandar este buque.

translation.en: No!
God, Jonathan! That was so dangerous!
Where's my baby?
Thar she blows!
Okay. Well, okay. And now my clothes are wet.
translation.es: Qué bien. Ahora se me mojó la ropa.

translation.en: Jonathan Fall, you have shown a lack of responsibility,
and I have no choice but to remove you of your stripe.
translation.es: y no tengo más alternativa que quitarte un galón.

translation.en: - Please, sir. You can't do this. -
translation.es: Por favor, señor. No lo haga.

translation.en: - Well, I just did! -
Darn, that hurts.
Mom?
Dad?
Anyone home?
Mom? Dad?
Hello?
Anyone in here? No. Where are you guys?
- What the hell, Jonathan? - Hi.
You know very well what that metronome means.
translation.es: Sabes muy bien qué significa ese metrónomo.

translation.en: It's lovemaking at a BPM that makes us come
translation.es: Hacemos el amor a un ritmo que nos hace acabar

translation.en: at the exact same second.
Yes, I know. Sorry, I… I know.
Well? What?
It's just that I was, uh, demoted at work, and, um… I was just wondering
translation.es: Es que me degradaron en el trabajo, y me preguntaba

translation.en: if you could speak to Tanner
about me maybe getting some work experience on his ship.
translation.es: si podrían hablar con Tanner así gano experiencia en su buque.

translation.en: - He… He won't listen to me. - On Tanner's ship?
translation.es: A mí no me hace caso. ¿En el buque de Tanner?

translation.en: Is that how you wanna live your life, taking handouts to get what you want?
translation.es: ¿Así quieres vivir tu vida? ¿Aceptar limosnas para obtener lo que quieres?

translation.en: Not working for it? I don't think so.
translation.es: ¿Sin trabajar para conseguirlo? No me parece.

translation.en: - That's not how the Fall family works. -
translation.es: La familia Fall no se maneja así.

translation.en: No way.
Jonathan, darling.
Yes, Mom?
Why don't you get out of the room so that your father and I can finish?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te vas, así tu padre y yo podemos terminar?

translation.en: No offense, but your presence is a huge, huge turnoff.
translation.es: No te ofendas, pero tu presencia corta mucho el clima.

translation.en: Yes! Now, get the hell out!
- - Jesus. There we go.
Oh, you're s… Okay, yes. That's… That's my cue.
Okay. We're here.
Oh, and Liza, try not to attract any attention please.
translation.es: Liza, trata de no llamar la atención.

translation.en: - Just quick in and out, hmm? - Sure thing, Pedro.
You know me. I'll be discreet.
So what can I do for you?
My employer is looking for a captain for a high- end cruise ship.
translation.es: Mi empleador busca un capitán para un crucero de lujo.

translation.en: Perfect. We have some of the best candidates in the country.
translation.es: Perfecto. Tenemos a los mejores candidatos del país.

translation.en: Great. We are an unconventional cruise line,
and we are all about giving everyone a chance.
translation.es: y queremos darles oportunidades a todos.

translation.en: - Sounds good. - Yes.
So I was hoping we could start at the bottom of your deck and work our way up from there.
translation.es: Podríamos empezar desde lo más bajo e ir subiendo desde ahí.

translation.en: So you want the worst candidate?
Mm… Maybe.
Well, the very worst candidate is a man by the name of Jonathan Fall.
translation.es: El peor candidato es un hombre llamado Jonathan Fall.

translation.en: He was at the bottom of his class,
translation.es: Fue el peor de su clase y tiene todas las aptitudes

translation.en: and he has all the qualities that you're not looking for in a leader,
translation.es: Fue el peor de su clase y tiene todas las aptitudes que no se buscan en un líder. Como puede ver aquí.

translation.en: as you can see here.
translation.es: que no se buscan en un líder. Como puede ver aquí.

translation.en: Hmm. Gullibility through the roof,
extremely low on natural authority, alphaness, suspiciousness. Uh!
translation.es: ausencia total de autoridad natural, liderazgo y desconfianza.

translation.en: - This seems like a great fit. - Really?
Wow, this is so great to hear.
I'm gonna make a huge deal about this and tell everyone.
translation.es: Se lo contaré a todo el mundo.

translation.en: Hey. Please, please, Mrs. Porter.
Discretion is of immense importance to my employer.
translation.es: Mi empleador exige la máxima discreción.

translation.en: Are you kidding? I'm already making an Instagram post.
translation.es: ¿Es en serio? Lo publicaré en Instagram.

translation.en: We have over 900,000 followers, so the reach is pretty spectacular.
translation.es: Tenemos más de 900 000 seguidores, tendrá mucho alcance.

translation.en: This is bound to go viral,
and you and your employer will have your faces all over it.
translation.es: y su rostro y el de su empleador se verán en todas partes.

translation.en: You know, I'm so sorry, but we can't have that.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero no podemos permitirlo.

translation.en: - Ah! - Sorry.
Sorry. Uh, sorry. Sorry.
Shit.
Yeah, so, uh…
Sorry.
Merde.
And… sorry.
Smooth, Liza. Very smooth.
Well, I'll be cocked.
Jonathan!
Darling!
Breakfast is ready!
- For me? - Yes, for you, my little scoundrel.
translation.es: - ¿Para mí? - Sí, para ti, pequeño sinvergüenza.

translation.en: Johnny, good God, we've missed you so much.
- Since yesterday? - Yes, since yesterday. Did you sleep okay?
Oh… Okay. What? What is going on?
Please, Mom, this is disgusting. Ya… Revolting!
translation.es: Por favor, mamá. Esto es un asco. Me da náuseas.

translation.en: What? I am not allowed to tell my favorite son
translation.es: ¿Qué? ¿No puedo decirle a mi hijo preferido

translation.en: that I love him and miss him?
translation.es: que lo quiero y que lo extraño?

translation.en: What?! Love and miss Jonathan?
I'm… I'm the favorite son. Dad, tell her.
translation.es: Yo soy su hijo preferido. Díselo, papá.

translation.en: Sorry, Tanner. We don't favor any of our children.
translation.es: Perdón, Tanner. No hacemos favoritismo con nuestros hijos.

translation.en: But if I was to choose, which I won't, right now it would be Jonathan.
translation.es: Pero si tuviera que elegir, lo que no haré, sería Jonathan.

translation.en: Me too. If I had to. If I was pushed into a corner.
translation.es: Para mí también. Si tuviera que elegir. Si me pusieran en ese dilema.

translation.en: Okay. What kind of bizarre charade is this?
translation.es: Bien. ¿Qué clase de farsa es esta?

translation.en: You guys always say that you dread the day he was born,
translation.es: Siempre dicen que aborrecen el día en que él nació,

translation.en: and that he's a loser, and that you hoped for so long
translation.es: que es un fracasado, y que desean

translation.en: that there was a mix- up at the hospital, and you'd get your real child back.
translation.es: que lo hayan cambiado en el hospital y les devuelvan a su hijo de verdad.

translation.en: You always say that.
That's enough, Tanner. Shoo! Shoo!
You received this today from the Caribbean Queen.
translation.es: Hoy te enviaron esto del Reina del Caribe.

translation.en: You have received a formal job offer
translation.es: Recibiste una oferta formal de empleo

translation.en: to be a captain!
- Wow. - What?
What? We're kidding. We're joking, right?
Are we kidding? No? What are… You'll be the worst captain on earth!
translation.es: ¿Es una broma? ¿No? Serás el peor capitán del mundo.

translation.en: I don't get it!
It… It fits pretty great, doesn't it?
My beautiful boy, I'm so proud of you.
translation.es: Mi hermoso niño, estoy orgullosa de ti.

translation.en: Your car is here. Good luck… son.
- - Put that silly hand away.
Get in here. Oh yeah.
It's happening.
Oh, damn. That's a warm and loving hug.
- Your turn, Alexis. - Huh. Oh…
- Go on. You can do this. - Yes, I know how to hug.
translation.es: - Vamos. Tú puedes. - Sí, sé abrazar.

translation.en: - There it is. -
- So much love in the room. - Mm.
So much.
Okay, yeah.
Morning, Captain. Let me take that for you.
translation.es: Buenos días, capitán. Permítame llevar eso.

translation.en: Oh, thank you very much. That's, uh, me, Captain.
translation.es: Muchas gracias. Soy yo, el capitán.

translation.en: - Bye- bye, son! - Bye… - Great hug. - …you!
- Bye, Mom. Bye, Dad. - Bye!
- Bye- bye. - Bye, Consuela. Oh, bye, Tanner.
Wow.
Very well.
Very well indeed.
- You see that, Bon Jovi? -
That is my new captain.
The future of our enterprise.
